Simple Mode â€‹

See issue 69.
Simple Mode runs the program with minimal configuration and outputs a streamlined resultâ€”ideal for users who only need basic friend-link data.

Deployment Steps â€‹

1. Fork the Repository â€‹

Go to hexo-circle-of-friends and click Fork to copy the project to your account.

2. Edit the Configuration File â€‹

In your forked repository, open fc_settings.yaml and update:

yaml
LINK:
  - { link: "https://www.yyyzyyyz.cn/link/", theme: "butterfly" }
  • link â€“ your friend-links page URL
  • theme â€“ your blog theme (commonly butterfly)

3. Enable Simple Mode â€‹

Edit .github/workflows/CI.yml, set SIMPLE_MODE to true:

yaml
SIMPLE_MODE: true

4. Configure Actions Permissions â€‹

  1. Open Settings â†’ Actions â†’ General
  2. Under Workflow permissions, check Read and write permissions

5. Enable GitHub Actions â€‹

  1. Open the Actions tab in your repo
  2. Click â€œI understand my workflows, go ahead and enable themâ€
  3. Find the update-friends-posts workflow and click Enable workflow

6. Manually Run the Workflow â€‹

  1. Open the update-friends-posts workflow page
  2. Click Run workflow â†’ Run workflow
  3. Wait for completion


7. Retrieve the Data â€‹

After the run, the repository will upload data.json.
Its content matches the /all API response; download or fetch it directly for any front-end or downstream use.

Summary â€‹

  • Minimal configuration required
  • Outputs data.jsonâ€”no extra backend needed
  • Perfect for users who only need basic friend-link data
